column4: I just installed Ubuntu and am having difficulty getting my ubuntu box to communicate with my winxp box
My windows box and my linux box can't ping each other.
I'm at my windows box.  But my linux box is right beside me.
Er...  I mean it shows up under ifconfig.
can you get your networking app open?
check your network settings in there. Possible you missed setting a gateway.
do you have DHCP on your network?
set the gateway to the winxp IP address
good. Try pinging to the winxp box
you also need to check the networking on your windows box
Just a thought. Can you ping the interfaces on their own machines?
